r.s: PHP extension for interfacing with Redis
r.d: This extension provides an API for communicating with Redis servers.
r.n:
phpredis 4.1.0
The primary new feature of this release is session locking functionality. Thanks to @SkydiveMarius!
* Add callbacks validate_sid and update_timestamp to session handler [aaaf0f23] (@hongboliu) * Call cluster_disconnect before destroying cluster object. [28ec4322] (Pavlo Yatsukhnenko) * Bulk strings can be zero length. (Michael Grunder) * Handle async parameter for flushDb and flushAll [beb6e8f3,acd10409,742cdd05] (Pavlo Yatsukhnenko) * Split INSTALL and add more instructions [43613d9e,80d2a917] (@remicollet, Pavlo Yatsukhnenko) * Only the first arg of connect and pconnect is required [063b5c1a] (@mathroc) * Add session locking functionality [300c7251] (@SkydiveMarius, Michael Grunder, Pavlo Yatsukhnenko) * Fix compression in RedisCluster [1aed74b4] (Pavlo Yatsukhnenko) * Refactor geo* commands + documentation improvements (Michael Grunder)
